extendedInfo.description: Listen to dublab's future roots radio on your Android!- Two streams to choose from: dub-stream or theme-stream- Background audio - listen while using other apps- Current show information displayed along top of screen- Share via Facebook or Twitterdublab is a non-profit web radio collective devoted to the growth of positive music, art and culture.

reviews.title: I want to like it.
reviews.comment: Really. But as of right now I see no reason to use it over TuneIn Pro. In TuneIn I can actually see the title of the show playing and I can control the buffer amount to prevent skipping.  What I do like about the dublap app so far is the UI and the sweet animations. Work-in show information (you say it\'s integrated, but I don\'t see it anywhere), a view of the event schedule and maybe a tap for the mp3 blog - and then you\'d be golden. Heck, I\'d pay for the app then.   Keep it up :D
reviews.author: Benjamin Byriel
